name: Marek vs Martin
description:
Bratislava Game Jam.
Theme: Controlling the weather.

The game frames the theme within the perspective of folklore, where Martin on the White horse, who usually comes in November to grace us with snow, got a bit drunk on some summer wine, and started to reek havoc in the middle of August. It’s up to the Saint Marek and his trusty bear, to use his weather controlling powers and clean up after poor old Martin.

Brought to you by The Royal Pinnipeds team, in 42h.

Timo, Ivo, Peter, Miriam.
